Crimes.Crime_Name: Withholding material facts in immigration application
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in determining that the 2005 decision granting refugee protection was obtained by withholding material facts
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's credibility undermined due to omissions
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Fingerprint records, travel history, criminal record
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 109 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Claimed persecution in Somalia based on Tunni ethnicity
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Omission of U.S. presence and criminal history
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Materiality of misrepresentation or omission under Section 109
Crimes.Application_Factor: Withholding material facts related to whereabouts and criminal history
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the original refugee decision tainted by misrepresentation?
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Withheld information about time spent in the U.S. and criminal record
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Newly discovered fingerprint evidence confirming prior U.S. entry
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Board followed fair procedures in reassessment
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant credibility concerns due to non-disclosure
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to Board’s finding of material misrepresentation
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Proper application of vacation powers under Section 109
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose criminal history and presence in the U.S.

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in determining that the 2005 decision was obtained through misrepresentation
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: False statements regarding location and circumstances
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 109 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: False statements about being in Somalia instead of the U.S.
Crimes.Application_Factor: Providing false information about presence in Somalia
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the original refugee decision based on misrepresentation?
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Made false statements about location and circumstances to obtain refugee status
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Use of fingerprint evidence to establish prior U.S. entry
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Board conducted a procedurally fair reassessment
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious credibility defects due to demonstrably false claims
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Contested reasonableness of Board’s factual findings
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of Minister’s authority to vacate under Section 109
